summary: Consists of new narration by James Earl Jones, which is interspersed with the Disney shorts John Henry (2000), Johnny Appleseed (1948), Paul Bunyan (1958), and The Brave Engineer (1950).
cast: James Earl Jones|Alfre Woodard|Geoffrey Jones|Tim Hodge|Dave Murray|Carrie Harrington|Dennis Day|Jerry Colonna|Bob Amsberry|Parley Baer|Ken Christy|Dal McKennon|Thurl Ravenscroft
director: Directors: Lara Shapiro, Mark Henn | 2 more credits »
title: American Legends
